name: Bubu ❤️
greetingText: Another year more amazing, more you.
wishText: You walked into my life and turned everything brighter. I can’t thank you enough for being my calm, my chaos, and my favorite person all at once. Happy Birthday, my love , may this year bring you the same happiness you bring into my life every single day.
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to the most beautiful human ever 🥹💖
text2: I was going to just send you a message...
text3: But then I thought , no, that’s too normal for you.
text4: You deserve something a little more
text5Content: You’re the most special part of my world, Bubu 💞
outroText: Hope you smiled while reading this , because that’s my favorite thing to see. Can’t wait to celebrate later 😚
replayText: Your surprise is waiting... tap here 💖
